Package net.skinsrestorer.api.event

Interface SkinsRestorerEvent

All Known Subinterfaces:
SkinApplyEvent
public interface SkinsRestorerEvent
The SkinsRestorerEvent interface represents an event that can be triggered by the SkinsRestorer plugin. All event classes that are part of the SkinsRestorer event system should implement this interface.

To listen for SkinsRestorer events, you can create a class that implements the corresponding event listener interface, and register your listener using the EventBus.subscribe(Object, Class, Consumer) method.

See Also:
  • EventBus
